title: Kadhalin Deepam Ondru Lyrics Thambikku Entha Ooru
stanzas:
Kadhalin Deepam Ondru Song Lyrics Thambikku Entha Ooru
#Ilaiyaraja #SPB

oodalil vandha sondham
koodalil kanda inbam
mayakkam enna
kadhal vazhga.

netru pol indru illai
indru pol nalai illai (2)

anbile vazhum nenjil
aayiram paadale
ondruthaan ennam endraal
uravuthaan raagamaa

ponnile poovai allum
punnagai munnudhe
kannile gaandham vaitha
kavithaiyai paaduthe

oodalil vandha sondham
koodalil kanda inbam
mayakkam enna
kadhal vazhga.
